item.title: Wall Mounted Desktop
item.description: Quick Summary: These are the specs and links for my Wall-Mounted Desktop. Motherboard DQ77KB     Link here: dq77kb I worked a year at Intel in the Digital Signage Lab, and we used these boards to put systems together. Everything you need in a very tight package. CPU Intel Core i7-3770K i7-3770K Quad Core, 8 CPU’s. 3.5Ghz. Folks, this chip is the Real Deal. Get a big(ger) power supply!! (See below)
